question: Shenzhen Ruitai Mould Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: About Us - Ruitai Mould
results.content: Whether you need CNC plastic prototype/CNC metal prototype/rubber prototype/wood prototype and small batch production and mass production, Ruitai can always satisfy your needs. Ruitai team can give you 7 days with 24 hours of online support if you need to do a prototype. Just send us your CAD files and we will give you a quick turn
results.raw_content:
A Wide Range of Capabilities
Established in 2006, Ruitai continued to improve and expand our prototyping and manufacturing services in China. Our capabilities cover CNC machining, 3D printing, vacuum casting, injection molding, sheet metal fabrication, die casting, etc.
Professional Engineering Guidance
At Ruitai, we get an energetic, knowledgeable, and well-experienced engineering team to assist your manufacturing projects. If you need any guidance on selecting the best material/surface finish/processing way, we can be your guide.
High-quality & Fast Lead-time
As an ISO9000:2015 certification-compliant manufacturer, Ruitai always puts Quality first. Every step of our processing is done according to the highest standard of the industry. To further ensure the quality of our parts, we will do a strict quality inspection and send you the CMM report.
Efficiency is also an important factor that we take into consideration. We usually deliver you plastic and metal prototypes within days.
Our Vision and Mission
Over the decades, we have been expanding our manufacturing capabilities from scratch. It will be a big chance for us to be a better manufacturing service provider in the following years worldwide.
It is a great honor for us to be satisfying and trustful prototyping and manufacturing services provider for clients all over the world.
Advanced Prototype and Molding Manufacturing
Ruitai has advanced state-of-the-art equipment to support your project: automatic 3/4/5 axis of CNC machining production, high precision CNC center, stamping machine, bending machine, and more.
With the support of these machines, the Ruitai team offers you high-precision components.
Any Kinds of Prototype to Support Your Project
Whether you need CNC plastic prototype/CNC metal prototype/rubber prototype/wood prototype and small batch production and mass production, Ruitai can always satisfy your needs.
Ruitai team can give you 7 days with 24 hours of online support if you need to do a prototype. Just send us your CAD files and we will give you a quick turn
Kinds of Surface Treatment for Your Prototype
Ruitai Prototype can give you different kinds of surface treatments for your prototype.
We will give you the best solution according to your material and requirements, we can make a painting/anodized/chrome plated and some other surface treatment
Products
Support
Contact

results.title: Ruitai Mould
results.content: More than 80% of Ruitai employees have more than 10 years of experience in the field of prototype manufacturing, and are experienced masters of CNC machining parts production technology; ⭐Wide range of services. Our main manufacturing services cover CNC machining, 3D printing, sheet metal manufacturing, vacuum casting, injection molding, etc;
results.raw_content:
Ruitai Mould
Best CNC Machining Company & Parts Manufacturers-Ruitai Mould
A One-stop Rapid Prototyping CNC Machining Services Company
⭐From prototyping to production, Ruitai provides a series of solutions. We have professional CNC finishing manufacturing technology, that provides on-demand manufacturing services to help you develop effective prototype custom parts and turn your product ideas into reality.
⭐Ruitai parts prototype materials are diverse and of high quality. We have more than 70 kinds of materials and a variety of CNC machining process technologies. We can produce and process custom parts to a high standard.
⭐For rapid prototyping, Ruitai has a mature CNC machining application engineering team to serve you. Whether you need the production of small molded parts or the processing of large parts, we have a professional digital manufacturing technical team to provide you with professional and accurate prototyping services.
Ruitai Rapid Precision Prototype Machining Services
We apply CNC machining to create high-precision metal and plastic parts. The tolerance of machined metal parts can reach ±0.008mm.
3D printing is high-efficient manufacturing to create low-volume prototypes. At Ruitai, SLA and SLS rapid prototyping are two printing technologies we use to deliver functional prototypes.
Sheet metal fabrication refers to an array of techniques including piercing, stamping, cutting, bending, and welding. We make the metal parts with specific sizes and types according to your drawings.
Before mass production, if you need small batch production for plastic material, vacuum casting is the best choice for you. The vacuum casting prototypes are applied to test and verify the feasibility of the design.
If you are considering to create plastic parts with high volume, injection molding is your top-list choice. It involves rapid tooling to produce the molds. That’s why the injection molded parts are of high repeatability and tight tolerance.
At Ruitai, aluminum and zinc are popular materials for die casting because of their excellent engineering properties. We apply hot chamble and cold chamble die casting to deliver you high-quality metals parts.
Complete Precision CNC Machining Workshop
Ruitai has professional CNC machining programs and corresponding CNC machining tools, whether you need low-volume prototypes, small batch production, or mass production for your projects, Ruitai CNC machining shop can always satisfy your different manufacturing needs.
Over the years, we have provided numerous manufacturing services to various industries around the world, producing thousands of high-quality parts.
A variety of raw materials to support your design projects
At Ruitai Platform, we have a variety of raw materials to ensure that your design project is successfully completed. Whether it’s metal, plastic, or various alloys, we have the best raw materials. You can choose freely according to your design project, or you can find us to match it for you.
Metal At Ruitai, we mainly use CNC processing, sheet metal processing, die casting, metal injection molding, 3D printing, etc. to process and produce various high-quality metal parts for you. Our metals include but are not limited to: Iron Zinc Magnesium Aluminum Copper Titanium Steel
Alloy In different usage scenarios, the materials of parts will be different. In most cases, alloy materials are a good choice. Our alloys include but are not limited to: Stainless steel Alloy steel Titanium alloy Copper alloy Aluminum alloy Inconel
Plastic Additionally, we offer you various types of plastic to match your design. Ruitai will provide you with high-quality plastic products of various materials through CNC processing, injection molding, silicone molding, 3D printing, etc. Our plastics include but are not limited to:
ABS Acaylic Nylon PVC PET PEEK Polyacetal Polyethylene Polypropylene Polycarbonate
Our Ordering Process
Upload + Quote Upload your design files and tell us important details about your project. Our professional engineers will check the production specifications based on the data you provide us. If there are any unreasonable designs, we will provide constructive suggestions for your project based on many years of production experience, and then send you the most professional and preferential production prices.
Production When you accept our quotation, confirm to cooperate with us, and send us a purchase order, we will immediately arrange production for your order.
Quality + Inspection As a leading provider of prototyping and manufacturing CNC machining services, Ruitai inspects all parts before they arrive at you, and each part is tested to ensure they 100% meet your standards and provides you with a CMM Test report or ROHS report. It ensures you get a high-quality and well-functioning prototype.
Deliver Goods Once approved, your custom part will be dispatched and shipped immediately to your designated shipping address.
Our Packaging
To better protect your custom parts, Ruitai will often provide you with custom packaging based on the size, dimensions, and material of the part. Commonly used packaging includes cartons and wooden boxes. Below are actual packaging pictures of a small part of our factory.
Product packaging
Carton packing
Wooden packing
Reasons Why Most Companies Choose Ruitai CNC Precision Machining Services
Ruitai has over 15 years of experience in prototype and manufacturing. We get the expertise and confidence to offer you high-quality metal and plastic parts.
With around 50+ sets of CNC machines, we can deliver premium quality parts within a week. As our machines run 24 hours with 3 shifts, it gives us the confidence to assist your urgent orders with a fast turnaround.
According to your 3D&2D files, the engineers at the Ruitai team will analyze them and give you the best solution and suggestions. If you have any updates on the drawings before production, you can contact us anytime.
Ruitai has advanced automatic prototype production lines, which allow us to deliver you parts as to the lead time we scheduled even in peak season.
The Ruitai sales team can give you 7 days with 24 hours of online support for your prototype projects. And we will quote for your prototypes within 4 hours during the working time after receiving your 3D&2D files.
Ruitai Mould will do more than 6 times checking on your plastic and metal components during production. We are confident that every part can meet your requirements for accuracy and performance.
Who Needs Ruitai CNC Machining Prototypes
If you are an independent entrepreneur designer/innovator, Ruitai is willing to be your custom manufacturer to make low-volume functional prototypes to test the feasibility of your design.
If you are a design company with various prototyping and manufacturing requirements, Ruitai can provide you with 100% support. And there is no minimum order quantity(MOQ) for your project.
If you are a Global manufacturer has R&D ability, you must need our help. As long as your send 3D&2D files and requirements to the Ruitai team, we will help you from small-batch production to mass production.
Prototyping and Manufacturing Cases
Send Your Inquiry Now
FAQs
We do not have MOQ for every order. And we can manufacture your prototype from 1 pc.
Yes, you can. We are very glad to invite you to our prototype factory after COVID-19.
Yes, all of our prototypes can be packed well and shipped to anywhere like America and Canada.
Of course, just tell us which certification you want to check, we will give you a clear PDF format.
We only accept T/T 50% deposit, and 50% before shipment. We will send the CMM test report and final photos to you for approval.
Not exactly, Ruitai can also do sheet metal parts, 3D print, vacuum casting, small batch production, metal parts, and mass production, just send us your requirement.
Yes, we are a first-class CNC machining company, with a top-level CNC machining workshop, which can increase the production speed of parts, allowing you to greatly reduce painful and time-consuming rework time.
Confidentiality is strong. Before you send the CAD file to us, Ruitai is happy to sign the NDA file with you to protect your unique CNC machining design file.
If you are a novice design genius, the Ruitai team is willing to guide and assist you to complete one-time to long-term CNC machining and manufacturing projects.

Support

Ruitai Team
The Ruitai team is well-experienced and energetic in prototyping and manufacturing. Through 15+ years of development, we have become an expert to give the best solution for clients worldwide. We hope that we can be your best satisfying manufacturing partner in China. Welcome to visit us!
Mr. Wu founded Shenzhen Ruitai Mould Technology Co., Ltd. in 2004. He is not only the general manager of the company responsible for the operation, but also a senior engineer in the custom processing industry， who is familiar with projects from design, communication, production, and even customer service.
During the years of the company’s development, Mr. Wu has been adhering to the concept of “quality first, reputation first, service first, equality and mutual benefit”, making the enterprise develop steadily in the highly competitive market, and at the same time, gained a lot of good reviews from all over the world.
We focus on great customer experience and service, hope you will feel our warm and professional service.
E-mail:ruitai05@szrtmj.com

“I trust Bonnie 100% because she always completes the project perfectly every time. She is not only professional in her field, but also gets a great sense of humor. I am so happy to talk with her”.  Almost every client is attracted by Bonnie’s professionalism and humor.
She is also passionate about life. Running and reading are her two favorite things. She cherishes every opportunity and time to enrich herself every day. The people around her will be touched by her passion.

Her workability is undeniable.
With a self-disciplined life, she always retains a fairy tale kingdom in her heart, where her innocence, happiness, and strength of life are stored. She is like a sunflower, always facing the sun.

She is fluent in Japanese and English, has her own unique insights into molds and prototypes, and can provide very professional advice on your designs.

Senior Product Engineer at Shenzhen Ruitai Mold Technology Co.,Ltd
Hey,guys! Our companyâ€™s products services and some of the advantages have been introduces in the previous post.Today Iâ€™d like to tell you how does the #CNCprototype Work?
1.Â First,Â designs are built-in digital tool libraries that then give instructions to physical machines to make those designs automatically based on those digital instructions. #digital
2.Â CNC Prototype starts by designing the parts inÂ CAD software.Â The dimensions and properties of the final part are determined by a 3D model. #3ddesign
3.Â After that, CAM software is used to prepare the model for the whole process. It also checks the errors in the model, and a CNC program is created for fabricating the physical part. #partdesign
4.Â Next, the selection of parameters takes place. In this step, voltage, cutting speed, RPMs, and configuration of the machine are decided. #manufacturing
5.Â Lastly, the software is used to determine nesting in order to maximize material usage. Nesting plays the role of accurate placement and orientation of parts relative to the raw material.

It seems to be cooler than usual today.Todayâ€™s activity is to explain the PPT I made,which is a meaningful activity to improve my oral English.
Now let me give you a brief introduction of my PPT about the Olympic Games.
First of all, I talked about the origin and cause of the Olympic Games. I simply shared a small video with you. Then it introduces the process of electing and voting for Olympic venues and how Olympic MEDALS are made. I have to say that Japan is very good at recycling. The choice of mascots for the Games was particularly interesting, as they were chosen by Japanese primary school students, who are worthy of being represented by cute cartoon characters.
Finally, I also introduce some controversial things about the Olympic Games. For example, there were claims that the Olympics might be canceled because of the pandemic, leading to disputes over tickets and money. The second point is that people are selling Olympic volunteers' clothes at exorbitant prices on websites. The third point is about the waste of food. Although we live in a happy age, we still need to uphold the Chinese tradition of cherishing the virtue of food.
The above is today's activities in our company, looking forward to Ruitai can find more meaningful activities.

Cnc Machining Rapid Metal Prototyping
CNC machining rapid metal prototyping
CNC Rapid Metal Prototypeï¼?High Quality CNC machining rapid metal prototyping
In fact, most of the actual machining errors are caused by unreasonable machining processes, and the basic machining processes are guaranteed (such as â??pre-roughing, first-faced rear holes, first large-faced small facesâ?? or fixtures in milling CNC machiningâ??
PRODUCTÂ DESCRIPTION
How to make the size of aluminum parts more accurate?
1.Processing technology
In fact, most of the actual machining errors are caused by unreasonable machining processes, and the basic machining processes are guaranteed (such as â??pre-roughing, first-faced rear holes, first large-faced small facesâ?? or fixtures in milling CNC machiningâ?? Reduce the number of clamping times, try to use the combination of fixtures and other basic processing technology details, to minimize the machining error caused by iron filings on aluminum parts, because the aluminum parts are very soft, the excluded iron filings can easily cause machining errors in aluminum parts. . For example, in the FANUC or Central China Machining Center, the deep hole should be used as much as possible with the G83 command, so that the iron filings can be discharged instead of the G73 command.
2. Cutting three elements: cutting speed vc, feed rate f, cutting depth ap and tool compensation
In simple terms, under the premise of ensuring the processing quality and tool wear, the adjustment parameters fully exert the cutting performance of the tool, so that the cutting efficiency is the highest and the processing cost is the lowest.
In the CNC lathe, there are also factors such as cutter head wear compensation.
3. Tool setting
Inaccurate tool setting is also a factor in size error. Therefore, try to choose a good edge finder. If the machine has an automatic tool aligner, it is better.
Precision Aluminum Prototype With Cnc Machined
Precision Aluminum prototype with CNC machined
CNC Anodized Aluminum Prototype,Aluminum Metal Prototype

Home Appliance Model With 3D Painted
Home appliance model with 3D painted
SLA 3D Printin,Home appliance model with 3D painted Manufacturer
In the early stage of prototyping, a 3D data model is built in the computer, which can directly dismantle the parts and components, instead of manual experience, and avoid manual omission through intuitive and visual electronic supervision.PRODUCTÂ DESCRIPTION
There are two main advantages to using 3D printing:
1. Shorten the production cycle and improve efficiency
In the early stage of prototyping, a 3D data model is built in the computer, which can directly dismantle the parts and components, instead of manual experience, and avoid manual omission through intuitive and visual electronic supervision.
Manual corrections can take hours or even days of work. The prototype can be quickly corrected by electronic adjustment. After the modeling is completed, it can be printed directly. It can be said that the production time is quite saved.
2, the threshold is low, adapt to the development of modern society
The threshold for traditional hand-made production is relatively high, and it requires the styling ability of the prototype. There are also many tricks in the actual production process. For example, "partition", it is not only OK to assemble, so is the part beautiful? Late volume capacity cannot be achieved? Many factors, such as the difficulty control of large-scale painting, should be considered.
The requirements of 3D modeling relative to pure hand-made are much lower. As long as you can operate 3D software more skillfully and have a certain modeling foundation, you can create a hand through 3D printing. Now it is also because it is relatively high-handed, and it can maximize its advantages in the later stage, and can adapt to the future development needs of the hand-held industry.

Our team of highly experienced craftsmen have been manipulating sheet metal for years and come from a wide range of backgrounds.
